name: enscript-highlight
description:
This plugin adds syntax highlighting for Encase Scripts (aka enscript files).

Actually it is a modified version of the cpp.vim module, but I'm planning to add autocompletion and more fixups.

Please. Feel free to send me patches and bug reports to: g??cnapnxr@lbhgrez.pbz
install_details:
On w32:
 - Copy the vimfiles/ directory into your vim home.
 - Copy enscript.vim into your vim's home
 - Add this line to your vimrc: (_vimrc on w32):
   source /path/to/vim/enscript.vim

There's a sample vimrc that you can get it if you want to test my vim configuration :)
